name: Osiris (itch) (Max Pfeifer)
description:
Play as a lone scavenger in a desolate world who is on the search for supplies. Navigate the post-apocalyptic world in order to reach the town's supermarket and find food and water. But you are not the only scavenger looking for shelter and supplies, you must also avoid and sneak past a hostile faction in order to stay safe.

My website: https://www.maxpfeifer.com/

Sounds effects: https://freesound.org/

Music: https://www.purple-planet.com/

Models: https://sketchfab.com/feed

Full attribution list: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1NxAHrbF-fLYfvytvEZQ079p6bHzO7mdb7zL_yUsByus/...
